name: Edward (the envious brother)
story: I was in the library. I think it was Victoria; I heard her fighting with Archie.

name: Victoria (the jealous lover)
story: When I found Archie, he was dead. I think it was Samuel, he never liked Archie's business decisions.

name: Samuel (the conniving business partner)
story: I was in my room when I heard Victoria scream. I think it was Edward, I saw him carrying Archie's ring.

name: Reginald (the loyal butler)
story: I saw Mr. Samuel go into the Study with Sir Archibald before he died. I saw Mr. Edward carry a letter to the library. Madam Victoria was worried Sir Archibald was having an affair.
